divs: Sighting Detailshadnt had exercise for a number of days so i decided to take a short walk toward the airport in manteo, nc. it was a pure black night and i couldnt see the road in front of me. as i came out from behind a large tree that lines the airport property i looked up and say a round yellow light with a thin gray uneven film on the surface moving to the left, slowly. the round light was bigger than a full moon but i could not make out the rest of the craft. as i said before the night was pitch black. i smiled and laughed, my heart jumped for joy because i had been looking for just such a sight ever since i have heard of ufo,s i stood transfixed because i knew that this was the real thing and up close. i also knew what was transpiring within the ufo. they were punching in cordinates for their journey. as i watched the light became intensly white and i wiped my eyes, looked up again and that light was already almost out of sight. it took 3 seconds to disappear.it went directly east over the atlantic ocean. there was no sound at any time, it hovered perfectly still until it moved east. i have been down there on dark nights hoping to see another of the same but no luck. thank you for your time. robert john vernier i felt very blessed that i had decided to take a walk that evening.
Summary: taking a late night walk toward the manteo airport passing a tree on the edge of the airport property i looked up at a light and i knew what it was.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Nags Head
There were no other sightings in Nags Head on or around September 30th 2008
